alert.note: Alert for Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dawes County through 730 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Whitney Lake, or 19 miles west of Chadron, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chadron, Red Cloud Campground, Chadron Airport, Chadron Campground, Whitney and Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
